title: The Beginning
excerpt: Find out where Freeloader and Subaiku came from, and how they see the fun and challenging game that is Stormbound.

title: Midsummer Buffs
excerpt: Sheepyard has gifted us some free content to discus. We oblige as only Freeloaders can!

title: OK, Boomers
excerpt: Freeloader and Subaiku are discussing some of the strongest elder cards in Stormbound. Who dodged the nerf hammer? Should they be nerfed now? Tune in to find out!

title: A New Bloke
excerpt: Freeloader and Subaiku welcome a third host. Who will this mystery host be, and are they truly crazy enough to spend an hour each week talking with us?!

title: What’s a Burf?
excerpt: Our hosts are hot on the trail of Stormbound breadcrumbs: an AMA, leaks in the Discord server and an interview with Brzoza help drawing a map of where Sheepyard is taking the game.

title: The Hunt for the Bread in October
excerpt: The Brewed Sages are excited for all the balance changes and new cards being introduced to Stormbound… but where are they going to find the resources to play with them?

title: From Earyn with Love
excerpt: Our hosts are back to discuss Stormbound with a very special guest. Emkaem makes his Brewed Sages debut and we review the state of the meta.

title: Introducing the BS Meta Report
excerpt: Our hosts have brewed up another tool to help Stormbound players achieve loftier finishes each month: The BS Meta Report! How does it work? Does it work?

title: A Winning Position(ing)
excerpt: In this last episode of October, our hosts discuss the extremely critical topic of unit positioning in Stormbound.

title: Nerfed November Rain of Frogs
excerpt: Our hosts are back again (and we are just as surprised as you)!  This time, it’s a whole new season of Stormbound—with a new card and multiple balance changes!

title: Valuing your Tempo
excerpt: Here to analyze the current meta with the second Meta Report AND an in-depth discussion on the difference and importance of tempo vs value.

title: Tempoing out some Value
excerpt: After deciding to change their schedule to an ever-other-week podcast, the hosts have now decided to return to a weekly podcast by dropping some sweet, sweet, Stormbound content a week early!

title: Bot Friends 4 Ever
excerpt: Freeloader gets a new friend to play with, Arthis has a new way to spend money in game, and Subaiku is just thankful he won’t see Earyn + Gift anymore… truly, a season to be grateful!

title: Linked Golems are POG Champs
excerpt: The hosts are back to discuss the 3rd BS Meta Report, whether Linked Golems are too powerful and the Conquest Tournament organized by the community!

title: Ending the Year with Vitality
excerpt: An incredible interview with the one-and-only RecklessRush + the patch notes for the upcoming January update from Sheepyard as our little holiday gift to one and all.

title: The Donuts of (Joust) Champions
excerpt: How are the balance changes going? Will The Brewed Sages be doing anything new this year? These questions and more will be answered—and come check out our new section: Card of the Week!

title: The BS is Getting PhD
excerpt: The hosts discuss the January edition of the BS Meta Report, provide an important PSA about playing Stormbound on an iOS device, and discuss the ever… existing card Rapid Mousers!

title: Hocus Focus
excerpt: We have news, we have an interview, we have a NEW CARD, and we have all the fun and excitement you can expect from three guys chatting about Stormbound!

title: The Temple Guardians of Doom
excerpt: An episode chalk full of upcoming changes to Stormbound! New cards, upgrades, game mechanic changes, and even quality of life improvements are all detailed!

title: 19 More than Subaiku Planned For
excerpt: We have all the analysis you could hope for on the new Temple of Heart, the changes to Confusion and Temple Guardians, along with plenty of laughs and bad ideas!

title: Head Banging to HV
excerpt: What card do they think is keeping rush down in the meta? Also, Arthis drops a HOT new track for the BS Meta Report theme song. Finally Emkaem wants to know which Brewed Sages episode is each hosts’ favorite… listen to find out!

title: Holding Out for a Hero (League)
excerpt: Who won Hanoo’s tournament? What cards are getting hit with the nerf hammer for March? What’s up with the new cards being introduced and… WAIT!! WHAT?? A NEW LEAGUE?!

title: Steady as She Goes
excerpt: How goes the early days of our new era? Is it a welcome change, or is it more of the same? Overall, how do the Brewed Sages feel about the current set of recent balance changes?

title: Running and GUNning
excerpt: What decks are strong and which have been nerfed? Are we achieving balance in the game? Also discussing the idea of a GUN (Generally Useful Neutral) and the number of such in use… is it healthy for the game?

title: There Goes My Hero
excerpt: We have a new Heroes League… and not all seems to be well at the top. Are we doing this right? Is it broken? Should we just walk away?

title: Patch Me if You Can
excerpt: We have patch notes for the upcoming Stormbound changes to discuss! What got nerfed? What got nerfed but didn’t? What even is a nerf? All this and Avian Stalkers for your listening enjoyment!

title: No Farms, No Food
excerpt: We return to discuss the end of the first season of The Hero League in Stormbound (congrats to RealSHTTTT!), the state of the recent balance changes, and how can farming ever really be “fixed.”

title: One Card's Nerf is Another Card's Buff
excerpt: Back again with the April BS Meta Report! How is Stormbound balancing? Did last month’s nerfs work? If so, what cards are replacing Ubass and Mirz in the meta? Find out all of this and more!

title: Pouring One Out
excerpt: The Brewed Sages say goodbye to one of their own.  Arthis leaves the podcast with one last analysis of the current state of Stormbound.

title: Heeding the Call of the Swarm
excerpt: What's receiving a buff? Which cards get the nerf hammer? Most importantly, are there any Burfs? Also, we open up the third chair to a guest host—an amazing voice from the community.

title: 2 Reckless 2 Rush, Tokyo Draft
excerpt: Discussing the recent May update: what new modes are being developed by the one and only Reckless Rush? How do they work, and most importantly: how much fun can they be?!

title: Meet me in the meta
excerpt: We dive into May’s Meta Report, some fun community tournaments, and we dive deeper into the state of the game. What mana-cost is under represented in the game? What deck is STILL tops for strength?

title: Très bon, mon Ahmi
excerpt: Discussing the Stormbound tournament community, the reveal of two new cards, and the ever exciting balance changes! A nerf (or two) sprinkled with some buffs… what does the June meta have in store for us—listen to find out!

title: Bon Chance, Mon Ahmi
excerpt: Is Unstable better? Is all the “Ahmi is really getting nerfed” talk for real?  Do any of the other cards that got buffed see play? Find out and learn about all the goings on in the community tournament scene (thanks Derk!) in this episode!

title: Casual Ultimate Warrior
excerpt: It may be a crazy month for the Brewed Sages, but they still managed to find some time to discuss their favorite topic: STORMBOUND! How’s the season going? What’s the meta look like? And… wait… new brawl modes?!

title: Going Rogue-like
excerpt: We chime in on the ENORMOUS changes that are coming! Balance changes, of course, a new card—but even more excitingly some BIG changes to Brawl: Check out the new modifiers, and the breadcrumbs Sheepyard has left us!

title: Holding Back the Year
excerpt: Half a year in review: focusing on the balance changes, the rewards changes, and the different brawls we now have—too much analysis for just 1 hour!

title: There Will Be Blood (Ministers)
excerpt: Welcoming back Thomas and dissecting the latest patch notes which encompass some of the largest changes to the game in its history. Balance changes, new (permanent) store offerings, and major updates to the Brawl!

title: The 800 Pound Sheep in the Room
excerpt: Jamming the new and improved Rogue Sheep in every deck. What’s working? What’s not? What happened to The Meta Report, anyway... and what's a Deck Detective?

title: When a Sheep is Shorn, a Chill Gets His Beard
excerpt: The Brewed Sages try an asynchronous episode (due to necessity, not a desire to complicate our lives further). Here’s all of our hot takes on the upcoming changes and the anniversary celebration!

title: A Rolling StoneyJ Gathers No Moss
excerpt: Back with a special guest, StoneyJ25, the current reigning champion of Heroes League for 3 straight months! How does he do it? What are his opinions on the state of the game?

title: Life, The Universe, and Patch Notes
excerpt: New cards AND new Brawl modes starting October 1st, and of course there are the usually buffs and burfs!

title: Defense is for Suckers
excerpt: Discussions on the current state of the game, viability of the different archetypes, and Subaiku’s overarching philosophy of playing Stormbound!

title: Yippee Ki Yaya, Brzoza
excerpt: We have patch notes but we also have an interview with the one and only Brzoza! How has the last year of development been for Sheepyard  What treasures are in store for players this coming year?

title: Avian Stalker Synergies
excerpt: A new Meta Report—this one with even more BS! Listen in as we walk you through its data, how to use it, and most importantly how it can help you play our favorite game!

title: Scrapping Plans for the Holidays
excerpt: We have our most anticipated monthly installment: the Patch Notes episode! What cards are getting nerfed? What cards are getting burfed? What cards might transition from meme to meta?

title: Get Your Veggies!
excerpt: We have so much to discuss from our new merch store, community news, the new Meta Report and the new Draft Mode!

title: Tokyo Draft (Redux)
excerpt: Back to bring tidings of a Holiday miracle: Draft Mode is here and it’s wonderful! We also will give you a walk-through of our BS Guide for the new mode (of course!) and data on the health and growth of the game!

title: A Stormbound Odyssey
excerpt: Oh, what a year it has been, fellow Stormbound players — and the Brewed Sages have compiled it all into 1 short hour of fun for you! What changed in 2021? What was added? Do we like where this game is headed?

title: Weathering the Storm-bound
excerpt: Patch notes are out, what do we think? Listeners have questions, what are the answers? And most importantly: WHAT DOES THE MIRC’s VOICE SOUND LIKE????
